00260     class Ctx {
00261     public:
00262         Ctx();
00263         ~Ctx();
00264         I32 arg_len() {
00265             return (I32)(PL_stack_sp - mark);
00266         }
00267         Scalar* arg(int n) {
00268             Scalar*s = new Scalar(fetch_stack(n));
00269             this->register_allocated(s);
00270             return s;
00271         }
00272         void ret(Scalar s) {
00273             this->ret(0, &s);
00274         }
00275         void ret(Scalar* s) {
00276             this->ret(0, s);
00277         }
00278         void ret(int n, Scalar* s) {
00279             this->ret(n, s ? s->serialize() : &PL_sv_undef);
00280         }
00281         void ret(int n, SV* s) {
00282             PL_stack_base[ax + n] = s;
00283         }
00284         bool wantarray() {
00285             return GIMME_V & G_ARRAY ? true : false;
00286         }
00287         void return_multi(std::vector<Scalar*>& vec) {
00288             if (vec.size() != 0) {
00289                 SV** sp = PL_stack_sp;
00290                 if ((unsigned int)(PL_stack_max - sp) < vec.size()) {
00291                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, vec.size());
00292                 }
00293 
00294                 std::vector<Scalar*>::iterator iter;
00295                 for (iter = vec.begin(); iter != vec.end(); iter++) {
00296                     PL_stack_base[ax++] = *iter ? (*iter)->serialize() : &PL_sv_undef;
00297                 }
00298                 ax--;
00299             } else {
00300                 this->return_undef();
00301             }
00302         }
00303         void return_true() {
00304             this->ret(0, &PL_sv_yes);
00305         }
00306         void return_undef() {
00307             this->ret(0, &PL_sv_undef);
00308         }
00309         void register_allocated(Value* v) {
00310             allocated.push_back(v);
00311         }
00312     protected:
00313         SV* fetch_stack(int n) {
00314             return PL_stack_base[this->ax + n];
00315         }
00316         I32 ax;
00317         SV ** mark;
00318         std::vector<Value*> allocated;
00319     };
00320     std::vector<Ctx*> ctxstack;
00321     Ctx::Ctx() {
00322         // same as dAXMARK
00323         this->ax = *PL_markstack_ptr + 1;
00324         --PL_markstack_ptr;
00325         this->mark = PL_stack_base + ax - 1;
00326 
00327         ctxstack.push_back(this);
00328     }
00329     Ctx::~Ctx() {
00330         std::vector<Value*>::iterator iter;
00331         for (iter = allocated.begin(); iter != allocated.end(); iter++) {
00332             delete *iter;
00333         }
00334 
00335         PL_stack_sp = PL_stack_base + ax;
00336 
00337         ctxstack.pop_back();
00338     }

00343     class CurCtx {
00344     public:
00345         static Ctx * get() {
00346             return ctxstack[ctxstack.size()-1];
00347         }

00356     Reference * Hash::fetch(const char* key) {
00357         // SV**    hv_fetch(HV* tb, const char* key, I32 klen, I32 lval)
00358         SV ** v = hv_fetch((HV*)this->val, key, strlen(key), 0);
00359         if (v) {
00360             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00361             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00362             return ref;
00363         } else {
00364             return NULL;
00365         }
00366     }
00367     Reference * Array::fetch(I32 key) {
00368         SV ** v = av_fetch((AV*)this->val, key, 0);
00369         if (v) {
00370             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00371             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00372             return ref;
00373         } else {
00374             return NULL;
00375         }
00376     }
00377     Scalar * Array::pop() {
00378         SV* v = av_pop((AV*)this->val);
00379         Scalar *s = new Scalar(v);
00380         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00381         return s;

00383     Scalar * Array::shift() {
00384         SV* v = av_shift((AV*)this->val);
00385         Scalar *s = new Scalar(v);
00386         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00387         return s;
00388     }
00389     Scalar * Array::store(I32 key, Scalar* _v) {
00390         _v->refcnt_inc();
00391         SV** v = av_store((AV*)this->val, key, _v->val);
00392         if (v) {
00393             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00394             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00395             return ref;
00396         } else {
00397             return NULL;
00398         }
00399     }

00422     class BootstrapCtx : public Ctx {
00423     public:
00424         BootstrapCtx() : Ctx() {
00425             xs_version_bootcheck();
00426         }
00427         ~BootstrapCtx() {
00428             PL_stack_base[this->ax] = &PL_sv_yes;
00429             PL_stack_sp = PL_stack_base + this->ax;
00430         }
00431     protected:
00432         // XS_VERSION_BOOTCHECK
00433         void xs_version_bootcheck() {
00434             SV *_sv;
00435             const char *vn = NULL, *module = SvPV_nolen_const(ST(0));
00436             if (this->arg_len() >= 2) {
00437                 /* version supplied as bootstrap arg */
00438                 _sv = PL_stack_base[ax+1];
00439             } else {
00440                 /* XXX GV_ADDWARN */
00441                 _sv = get_sv(Perl_form(aTHX_ "%s::%s", module,
00442                         vn = "XS_VERSION"), FALSE);
00443                 if (!_sv || !SvOK(_sv))
00444                 _sv = get_sv(Perl_form(aTHX_ "%s::%s", module,
00445                             vn = "VERSION"), FALSE);
00446             }
00447             if (_sv) {
00448                 SV *xssv = Perl_newSVpv(aTHX_ XS_VERSION, 0);
00449                 xssv = new_version(xssv);
00450                 if ( !sv_derived_from(_sv, "version") ) {
00451                     _sv = new_version(_sv);
00452                 }
00453                 if ( vcmp(_sv,xssv) ) {
00454                     Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s object version %"SVf" does not match %s%s%s%s %"SVf,
00455                         module, SVfARG(vstringify(xssv)),
00456                         vn ? "$" : "", vn ? module : "", vn ? "::" : "",
00457                         vn ? vn : "bootstrap parameter", SVfARG(vstringify(_sv)));
00458                 }
00459             }
00460         }
00461     };

00474     class Pointer : public Scalar {
00475     public:
00476         Pointer(SV* s) : Scalar(s) { }
00477         Pointer(void* _ptr, const char* klass) : Scalar(sv_newmortal()) {
00478             if (_ptr == NULL) {
00479                 sv_setsv(this->val, &PL_sv_undef);
00480             } else {
00481                 sv_setref_pv(this->val, klass, _ptr);
00482             }
00483         }
00484 
00485         template <class T>
00486         T* extract() {
00487             return INT2PTR(T *, SvROK(this->val) ? SvIV(SvRV(this->val)) : SvIV(this->val));
00488         }
00489     };

00494     class Perl {
00495     public:
00496         static void call(Code* code, U32 flags, Array * args, Array* retval) {
00497             SV **sp = PL_stack_sp;
00498 
00499             push_scope(); // ENTER
00500             save_int((int*)&PL_tmps_floor); // SAVETMPS
00501             PL_tmps_floor = PL_tmps_ix;
00502 
00503             if (++PL_markstack_ptr == PL_markstack_max) { // PUSHMARK(SP);
00504                 markstack_grow();
00505             }
00506             *PL_markstack_ptr = (I32)((sp) - PL_stack_base);
00507 
00508             std::vector<Scalar*>::iterator iter;
00509             for (int i =0; i < args->len()+1; i++) {
00510                 if (PL_stack_max - sp < 1) { // EXTEND()
00511                     // optimize?
00512                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, 1);
00513                 }
00514                 *++sp = args->pop()->val; // XPUSHs
00515             }
00516             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00517 
00518             int count = call_sv(code->val, flags);
00519 
00520             sp = PL_stack_sp; // SPAGAIN
00521 
00522             for (int i=0; i<count; i++) {
00523                 Scalar * s = new Scalar(*sp--);
00524                 CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00525                 retval->store(i, s);
00526             }
00527 
00528             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00529             if (PL_tmps_ix > PL_tmps_floor) { // FREETMPS
00530                 free_tmps();
00531             }
00532             pop_scope(); // LEAVE
00533         }
00534         // static Hash* get_stash(Str* name);
00535 //      template<class U>
00536 //      static void* alloc(int size) {
00537 //          void *buf;
00538 //          Newx(buf, size, U);
00539 //          return buf;
00540 //      }
00541     };

00543     Reference * Value::reference() {
00544         return Reference::new_inc(this->val);
00545     }

00547     Str* Scalar::as_str() {
00548         if (SvPOK(this->val)) {
00549             Str * s = new Str(this->val);
00550             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00551             return s;
00552         } else {
00553             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a string",
00554                 "Devel::BindPP",
00555                 "sv");
00556         }
00557     }

00559         if (SvROK(this->val)) {

00564             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a pointer",

00622     Hash * Reference::as_hash() {
00623         if (SvROK(this->val) && SvTYPE(SvRV(this->val))==SVt_PVHV) {
00624             HV* h = (HV*)SvRV(this->val);
00625             Hash * hobj = new Hash(h);
00626             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(hobj);
00627             return hobj;
00628         } else {
00629             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a hash reference",
00630                 "Devel::BindPP",
00631                 "hv");
00632         }
00633     }
00634     Array * Reference::as_array() {
00635         SV* v = this->val;
00636         if (SvROK(v) && SvTYPE(SvRV(v))==SVt_PVAV) {
00637             AV* a = (AV*)SvRV(v);
00638             Array * obj = new Array(a);
00639             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00640             return obj;
00641         } else {
00642             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00643                 "Devel::BindPP",
00644                 "av");
00645         }
00646     }
00647     Scalar * Reference::as_scalar() {
00648         SV* v = this->val;
00649         if (v && SvROK(v)) {
00650             SV* a = (SV*)SvRV(v);
00651             Scalar * obj = new Scalar(a);
00652             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00653             return obj;
00654         } else {
00655             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00656                 "Devel::BindPP",
00657                 "sv");
00658         }
00659     }
00660     Code * Reference::as_code() {
00661         SV* v = this->val;
00662         if (v && SvROK(v)) {
00663             SV* a = (SV*)SvRV(v);
00664             Code * obj = new Code(a);
00665             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00666             return obj;
00667         } else {
00668             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00669                 "Devel::BindPP",
00670                 "sv");

00674     Reference* Hash::del(const char*key, I32 klen) {
00675         Reference * ref = new Reference(hv_delete((HV*)this->val, key, klen, 0));
00676         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00677         return ref;
00678     }
00679     Reference* Hash::store(const char*key, I32 klen, Scalar*value) {
00680         value->refcnt_inc();
00681         SV ** s = hv_store((HV*)this->val, key, klen, value->val, 0);
00682         assert(s && SvROK(*s));
00683         Reference * ref = new Reference(*s);
00684         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00685         return ref;
00686     }

00689         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00690         return s;
00691     }

00696         hv_clear((HV*)this->val);

00699         Boolean* s = new Boolean(true);
